class gstLineIntersectionInfoFirstTwo_Param : public gstLineIntersectionInfoFirst_Param

First two intersections along line with object including parametric values (t1 and t2) of line where first two intersections occur.

From header file: gstLineIntersectionInfoFirstTwo_Param.h

Functions
